channel.title: Worst virus?
channel.description:
Well my cousin and I are in a huge fight and I want to crash his computer completely.... (its at my house)
I dont want to smash is or anything.

item.title: Worst virus?
item.dc:creator: @mr_arrows95 bansil
item.description:
@mr_arrows95 wrote:

[quote=“marluxia, post:19, topic:335551”]OK. So this is what you do. First organize a family get together between both your families. Ask your mom to organize it at your house. Be very nice at the family get together. Remember to act genuinely polite as if you are really trying to make up. Be nice to your cousin and pretend to put the past behind you. After everyone has had a great day ask to your mom if “cousins name” can sleep over. Let him sleep in your room on a mattress or something. Okay, here’s the good bit. Get some petroleum jelly from the bathroom and get a old sheet from the closet. Cut to eye holes in the sheet so you can see and also a mouth hole so you can speak. Place the sheet over your head (like a ghost). Craftfully sneak up to where he is sleeping and fling the petroleum jelly all over his body so it looks like ectoplasm! Now for the most important part. As quietly as possible you have to try to open his pants. Now scare the living daylight out him by giving him a ghost blowjob![/quote][quote=“marluxia, post:19, topic:335551”]OK. So this is what you do. First organize a family get together between both your families. Ask your mom to organize it at your house. Be very nice at the family get together. Remember to act genuinely polite as if you are really trying to make up. Be nice to your cousin and pretend to put the past behind you. After everyone has had a great day ask to your mom if “cousins name” can sleep over. Let him sleep in your room on a mattress or something. Okay, here’s the good bit. Place the sheet over your head (like a ghost). Craftfully sneak up to where he is sleeping and fling the petroleum jelly all over his body so it looks like ectoplasm! Now for the most important part. item.title: Worst virus?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Get a screen shot of your whole screen. Press printScreen on Windows. On a Mac press Shift-Cmd-3 simultaneously.
Go to paint in Windows. Go to Preview on a Mac.

Press Ctrl+V to paste.

Rotate it upsidedown.

Save as background.

Go To your desktop and right click.

Click properties

Go to browse.

Browse the saved upsidedown screenshot

Press OK.

Right Click on desktop.

Go to arrange icons. Click show desktop icons.

Hide the task bar!

Voila.

Read full topic

item.title: Worst virus?
item.dc:creator: @marluxia marluxia
item.description:
@marluxia wrote:

OK. So this is what you do. First organize a family get together between both your families. Ask your mom to organize it at your house. Be very nice at the family get together. Remember to act genuinely polite as if you are really trying to make up. Be nice to your cousin and pretend to put the past behind you. After everyone has had a great day ask to your mom if “cousins name” can sleep over. Let him sleep in your room on a mattress or something. Okay, here’s the good bit. Get some petroleum jelly from the bathroom and get a old sheet from the closet. Cut two eye holes in the sheet so you can see and also a mouth hole so you can speak. Place the sheet over your head (like a ghost). Craftfully sneak up to where he is sleeping and fling the petroleum jelly all over his body so it looks like ectoplasm! Now for the most important part. As quietly as possible you have to try to open his pants. Now scare the living daylight out him by giving him a ghost blowjob!

Read full topic

item.title: Worst virus?
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“mwiebelhaus, post:17, topic:335551”][quote author=Tenen link=topic=431931.msg3170625#msg3170625 date=1270414220]

Just go beat him shitless like a man.

this

This is the best

you could also set up a simple AHK script that shuts the computer down when ran (force shutdown or something like that), and put the script in the Startup folder (considering your cousin is an idiot, he won’t know how to bypass this)
[/quote][/quote]l2quote

Also:

[quote=“Elijah, post:15, topic:335551”]Take out the CMOS battery, he’ll flip shit when he sees it.[/quote]Basically just do what this kid and I said, and take out anything from the inside that is needed to run the computer, but not something obvious like the HDD.

Read full topic
